data.text:
Niall Horan 2023 Uk & Ireland Tour (To Be Announced) – Pre-sale Terms And Conditions

1. We are EMI Records a division of Universal Music Operations Limited a company registered in England and Wales at 4 Pancras Square, London, N1 4AG (“UMO”) who operate the Niall Horan UK Store: https://shopuk.niallhoran.com/.

2. To access the exclusive pre-sale window for tickets to the Niall Horan 2023 UK & Ireland shows “Tour” pre-order ‘The Show’ on any format from the Niall Horan UK online store or submit your email address via the online form: https://uk-umg.com/um-forms/40701-956612.html by 18:00pm BST on Friday 31st March 2023. No purchase necessary. One pre-sale code per person. The pre-sale code will give you access to buy Tour tickets in accordance with these terms.

3. The Tour dates, locations and pre-sale purchase window will be announced in Summer 2023. You will receive your unique pre-sale code thereafter via email together with a link to the ticket provider’s website where you can redeem the pre-sale code to purchase tickets once the pre-sale window opens. We do not accept responsibility if the email we send to the email address you have provided does not reach you for any reason beyond our reasonable control, including where the email is flagged as spam.

4. The pre-sale code can only be used once and must be redeemed by the time and date shown on the pre-sale code email you receive. The pre-sale code is personal to you and cannot be used by or transferred to anyone else.

5. Tour dates available will be within the UK and Ireland only. Only a limited number of tickets will be available. The code gives you access to the pre-sale only and is not a guarantee that you’ll be able to buy tickets to the Tour. All tickets are subject to availability.

6. The pre-sale code can only be subject to the terms and conditions applicable at the time of purchase of the tickets. Tour dates may be age restricted, please check with your ticket provider directly for more information. We are not the ticket provider so cannot be responsible for any issues with the purchase of or your use of the tickets. UMO is not liable for issues with any ticket purchase from third-party ticket providers. For any issues regarding the purchasing of tickets, please contact the relevant ticket provider.

7. Pre-sale codes have no cash value and cannot be exchanged. Pre-sale codes are non-transferable, case-sensitive, and available for one-time use only. By pre-ordering Niall Horan ‘The Show’ release or by registering to receive a pre-sale code you are deemed to have accepted these terms and conditions. Any personal data you provide when registering to receive a pre-sale code will be used in accordance with the Privacy Policy which you can read here https://www.umusic.co.uk/privacy.html

8. These terms and conditions are governed by English law, and the parties submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.
